section.p: You refuse to pay the fine. The arbiters shrug resignedly. 'As you wish, Exalted One,' mutters one from behind an intricately carved mask that is fashioned to resemble a hawk, a bird sacred to Ebron.

The religious penal codes of Uttaku state that the nobles of Uttaku are not above the law - however, as nobles, any fines imposed need be paid only on a voluntary basis unless the crime is heresy. You are free to go. .
